Package webserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionHandler
    This is the entity handler for connections.
    CourseHandler
    Handles all requests to courses and their members.
    EntityHandler
    An entity handler will present CRUD actions for the respective entity that are used by the website interface.
    ExerciseHandler
    This is the entity handler for exercises.
    GritServer
    This Class is instantiated on startup of the system.
    XmlHandler
    This is the entity handler for exercises.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestException
    Indicates that there was an error due to a bad request.
    InternalActionErrorException
    Indicates that there was an error performing an action in an entity handler and the error was not caused by the user / the UI.
